1THESS 4.9 aþþan bi broþrulubon ni þaurbum meljan izwis, unte silbans jus at guda uslaisidai sijuþ du frijon izwis misso.
1THESS 4.10 jah auk taujiþ þata in allans broþruns in allai Makidonai;

aþþan bidjam izwis, broþrjus, biauknan mais 1THESS 4.11 jah biarbaidjan anaqal jah taujan swesa jah waurkjan handum izwaraim, swaswe jah izwis anabudum, 1THESS 4.12 ei gaggaiþ gafehaba du þaim þaiei uta sind jah ni ainishun ƕis þaurbeiþ.
1THESS 4.13 aþþan ni wileima izwis unweisans, broþrjus, bi þans anaslepandans, ei ni saurgaiþ swe þai anþarai þaiei ni haband wen.
1THESS 4.14 unte jabai galaubjam þatei Iesus gaswalt jah usstoþ, swa jah guþ þans þaiei anasaislepun þairh Iesu tiuhiþ miþ imma.
1THESS 4.15 þat-uþ-þan izwis qiþam in waurda fraujins, þatei weis þai libandans, þai bilaibidans in quma fraujins ni bisniwam faur þans anaslepandans;
1THESS 4.16 unte silba frauja in haitjai, in stibnai arkaggilaus jah in þuthaurna gudis dalaþ atsteigiþ af himina jah dauþans þai in Xristau usstandand faurþis.
1THESS 4.17 þaþro þan weis þai libandans, þai aflifnandans suns miþ imma frawilwanda in milhmam du gamotjan fraujin in luftau jah swa framwigis miþ fraujin wairþam.
1THESS 4.18 swaei nu þrafsteiþ izwis misso in þaim waurdam.
1THESS 5.1 Aþþan bi þo þeihsa jah mela, broþrjus, ni þaurbum ei izwis meljaima;
1THESS 5.2 unte silbans glaggwo wituþ þatei dags fraujins swe þiubs in naht swa qimiþ.
1THESS 5.3 þan qiþand: gawairþi jah tulgiþa, þanuh unweniggo ins biqimiþ fralusts swaswe sair qiþuhafton, jah ni unþaþliuhand.
1THESS 5.4 aþþan jus, broþrjus, ni sijuþ in riqiza, ei sa dags izwis swe þiubs gafahai;
1THESS 5.5 unte allai jus sunjus liuhadis sijuþ jah sunjus dagis;
ni siuþ nahts ni riqizis.
1THESS 5.6 þannu nu ni slepaima swe þai anþarai, ak wakaima jah warai sijaima;
1THESS 5.7 unte þaiei slepand, naht slepand, jah þaiei drugkanai wairþand, nahts drugkanai wairþand.
1THESS 5.8 iþ weis dagis wisandans usskawai sijaima, gahamodai brunjon galaubeinais jah friaþwos jah hilma wenai naseinais.

1THESS 5.9 unte ni satida uns guþ in hatis, ak du gafreideinai ganistais, þairh fraujan unsarana Iesu Xristu, 1THESS 5.10 saei gaswalt faur uns, ei, jaþþe slepaima jaþþe wakaima, samana miþ imma libaima.
1THESS 5.11 inuh þis þrafsteiþ izwis misso jah timrjaiþ ainƕarjizuh anþar anþarana, swaswe jah taujiþ.

1THESS 5.12 aþþan bidjam izwis, broþrjus, kunnan þans arbaidjandans in izwis jah faurstassjans izwarans in fraujin jah talzjandans izwis 1THESS 5.13 jah sweraiþ ins ufarassau in friaþwai in waurstwis ize jah gawairþi habaiþ in izwis.
1THESS 5.14 bidjam-uþ-þan izwis,
broþrjus, talzjaiþ þans ungatassans,
þrafstjaiþ þans grindafraþjans,
usþulaiþ þans siukans,
usbeisneigai sijaiþ wiþra allans.
1THESS 5.15 saiƕiþ ibai ƕas ubil und ubilamma ƕamma usgildai, ak sinteino þiuþ laistjaiþ miþ izwis misso jah wiþra allans.
1THESS 5.16 sinteino faginoþ in fraujin.
1THESS 5.17 unsweibandans bidjaiþ;
1THESS 5.18 in allamma awiliudoþ.
þata auk ist wilja gudis in Xristau Iesu in izwis.
1THESS 5.19 ahman ni afƕapjaiþ.
1THESS 5.20 praufetjam ni frakunneiþ.
1THESS 5.21 aþþan all uskiusaiþ;
þatei god sijai, gahabaiþ.
...1THESS 5.22 ubilaizo afhabaiþ izwis.
1THESS 5.23 aþþan silba guþ gawairþjis gaweihai izwis allandjo jah gahailana izwarana ahman, jah saiwala jah leik unfairinona in quma fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus gafastaindau.
1THESS 5.24 triggws saei laþoda izwis, saei jah taujiþ.
1THESS 5.25 broþrjus, bidjaiþ-uþ-þan jah bi uns.
